# This file contains a ParserMap that is equivalent to what the ParserDecoder
# produces for the parse_basic.p4 program.

parser_states {
  key: "accept"
  value {
    name: "accept"
    reserved_state: P4_PARSER_STATE_ACCEPT
  }
}
parser_states {
  key: "parse_ethernet"
  value {
    name: "parse_ethernet"
    extracted_header {
      name: "ethernet_t"
      header_paths: "ethernet"
    }
    transition {
      select {
        selector_fields: "etherType"
        cases {
          keyset_values {
            constant {
              value: 32923
              mask: 1
            }
          }
          next_state: "parse_l3_protocol_1"
        }
        cases {
          keyset_values {
            constant {
              value: 33011
              mask: 1
            }
          }
          next_state: "parse_l3_protocol_2"
        }
        cases {
          keyset_values {
            constant {
              value: 33024
              mask: 1
            }
          }
          next_state: "parse_vlan"
        }
        cases {
          is_default: true
          next_state: "accept"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
parser_states {
  key: "parse_l3_protocol_1"
  value {
    name: "parse_l3_protocol_1"
    extracted_header {
      name: "l3_protocol_1_t"
      header_paths: "l3_protocol_1"
    }
    transition {
      next_state: "accept"
    }
  }
}
parser_states {
  key: "parse_l3_protocol_2"
  value {
    name: "parse_l3_protocol_2"
    extracted_header {
      name: "l3_protocol_2_t"
      header_paths: "l3_protocol_2"
    }
    transition {
      next_state: "accept"
    }
  }
}
parser_states {
  key: "parse_vlan"
  value {
    name: "parse_vlan"
    extracted_header {
      name: "vlan_tag_t"
      header_paths: "vlan_tag"
    }
    transition {
      select {
        selector_fields: "etherType"
        cases {
          keyset_values {
            constant {
              value: 32923
              mask: 1
            }
          }
          next_state: "parse_l3_protocol_1"
        }
        cases {
          keyset_values {
            constant {
              value: 33011
              mask: 1
            }
          }
          next_state: "parse_l3_protocol_2"
        }
        cases {
          is_default: true
          next_state: "accept"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
parser_states {
  key: "reject"
  value {
    name: "reject"
    reserved_state: P4_PARSER_STATE_REJECT
  }
}
parser_states {
  key: "start"
  value {
    name: "start"
    reserved_state: P4_PARSER_STATE_START
    transition {
      next_state: "parse_ethernet"
    }
  }
}
